account.settings: Enter an email to your account settings

links.terms:
By creating an account, you agree to our
Terms of Use & Privacy Policy.

information.updateProfile: Updating your email address will only affect how you receive emails from us. Your login information will not change. Please continue to use your original email to sign in.

password.reseted: Thanks! If you have a RaceTrac Rewards account, you should receive an email from us explaining how to reset your password.

points.scan:
Scan your Rewards + Debit Card or enter 
your phone number on the pinpad 
of the pump to earn points.
points.use:
Use your points to redeem free items 
listed in the rewards catalog.
points.earn:
Earn 4 points for every $1 spent on qualifying 
products and 1 point for every gallon 
of fuel purchased.

errors.phoneInUse: This phone number is already linked to an existing account! Try signing in or enter a different phone number.
errors.phoneInUseLoged: This phone number is already connected to a Rewards account! Please enter a different phone number.
errors.emailInUse: This email is already linked to an existing account! Try signing in or sign up using another email address.
errors.userNotFound: Sorry, we couldn’t find an account associated with this email address! Please create a new account or contact Guest Services at guest@racetrac.com or 1-888-636-5589.
errors.transaction: Sorry, the information entered is not valid. Please try again. If you need further assistance, email guest@racetrac.com.
errors.registrationInProgress: Registration in progress for username, please check your email.
errors.emailLinkExpired: Oops! This email registration link has expired. Try resetting your password again.
errors.invalidPassword: The email or password you entered is invalid
errors.invalidChangePassword: Current password is incorrect, please try again.
errors.passwordNeedToBeNew: That's clever, but your new password is the same as your old one. Please try again!
errors.emailScore: Hmm… we don't recognize this email. Please contact our Guest Engagement team at guest@racetrac.com or 1-888-636-5589 to complete the process.
errors.invalidSessionToken: Sorry, the information entered is not valid. Please try again. If you need further assistance, email guest@racetrac.com.
errors.registrationInfo: Sorry, the information entered is not valid. Please try again. If you need further assistance, email guest@racetrac.com.
errors.appIssue: Something went wrong, please try again.
errors.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already linked to an existing account! Try using another email address.
errors.giftCouponNoSuchEmail: User not found or user's account was created through a social network. You can only gift coupons to other RaceTrac Rewards members
errors.unavailableReward: Fuel rewards limit for the account exceeded.
errors.invalidPhysicalCardCode: The Rewards Card Number you entered does not match any of our records. Please check the card number.
errors.physicalCardCodeInUse: The Rewards Card Number you entered is already in use, please add another card.
errors.toManyRequests: Our system is currently busy. Please try again shortly!
errors.giftCardsCountExceeded: You have reached the maximum number of gift cards allowed in your app. Either reload a current card or delete a zero balance gift card.
errors.invalidRewardCardNumber: The Rewards Card Number you entered does not match any of our records. Please check the card number.
errors.rewardCardNumerInUse: The Rewards Card Number you entered is already in use, please add another card.
errors.emailDoesNotMatch: The Email you entered does not match our records. Please make sure this is the same one you used to sign up for your Zipline account.

reedem.body: You must be the "cool friend", because a RaceTrac coupon has been shared with you! To redeem, download the app, sign up using the email address that the coupon was sent to and—voila!—the coupon is beamed lightning-quick to your app's coupon section. Enjoy!
reedem.appStore: Download RaceTrac on the iTunes App Store

giftCards.purchaseSuccessMessage: Success! Your payment has been processed. Your new gift card number is %@ with a balance of $%.2f.
giftCards.reloadSuccessMessage: Success! Your payment has been processed. Your gift card number is %@ with a balance of $%.2f.

validationMessages.invalidCardNumber: Please enter a valid card number

RewardDebitCard.EmailNotMatched: The Email you entered does not match our records. Please make sure this is the same one you used to sign up for your Zipline account.

redeem.redeemDescription: Are you sure you want to redeem %d points for this reward? This reward will be valid for 24 hours. If you don't use it during that time, the points will be added back to your account.
redeem.inufficientFunds: Sorry, you don't have enough points.
redeem.fuelRewardLimitation: Whoops! Looks like you already have this Reward in your cart. You can only redeem one Fuel Reward at a time

stores.noRecordFound: No results found. Tap here to clear search and filters.
